name: SurviveMars
0:
”Alexa, open Survive Mars”
”Alexa, start Survive Mars”
”Alexa, play Survive Mars”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: survive mars
des: Survive Mars is an interactive, decision-based game designed for Amazon Alexa that challenges players to establish and maintain a thriving colony on Mars. Throughout the game, players face various obstacles and must make strategic choices to manage resources such as food, water, oxygen, and population. Each round represents one Martian day and presents the player with a randomly selected challenge or decision scenario. The choices made will directly impact the resources and overall survival of the colony. With both free and premium content available, players can enjoy a diverse range of challenges, test their decision-making skills, and compete to achieve the longest-lasting Martian colony. Offering a unique, immersive experience, Survive Mars provides endless entertainment for strategy game enthusiasts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
